webs.name: Ermintek
webs.description: E-commerce made with React and Tailwind that consumes a dynamic API. The concept is the sale of cellphones and computer products

webs.name: Box-Bonny
webs.description: E-commerce made with React and developed with Paypal method payment. The idea is a site to buy gift packs for experiences and with an accesibility concept.

webs.name: MyTinerary
webs.description: Web app for travel itineraries. This app was developed with React and consumes an external dinamic API. It has a login and signup for users made with validator and Google.

webs.name: Amazing Events
webs.description: Web app for all types of events. It consumes an external dinamic API. It also has a search-bar that works combined with checkbox filters.

webs.name: Mindy Pet Shop
webs.description: Basic ecommerce without payment methods. It was a team project realized in two days. Designed with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
